start:
Hello there!
I can help you find out the exchange rates for today according to the NBRB.
If you want to know about applicable currencies, just type /help
And if you know your currency, enter the currency, for example => USD, EUR, ...

errors.system: Oops, something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.not_found:
Oops... I didn't find such a currency => {}
If you do not remember the currency, use the command /list
